title: In respect of those eligible hutment-dwellers on site who do not join the Project willingly the foll
clause_text: In respect of those eligible hutment-dwellers on site who do not join the Project willingly the following steps shall be taken : Provision for all of them shall be made in the rehabilitation component of the scheme.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
